articles.author: Anand Krishnamoorthy
articles.title: Asian Stocks to Drop as AI Jitters Hit Wall Street: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Asian equities retreated from a record after concerns over the impact of artificial intelligence on some companies spurred a selloff in US technology stocks. Gold and silver recouped some of their losses from the prior session.
articles.content: Asian equities retreated from a record after concerns over the impact of artificial intelligence on some companies spurred a selloff in US technology stocks. Gold and silver recouped some of their lo… [+304 chars]

articles.author: Stephen Clark
articles.title: When Amazon badly needed a ride, Europe’s Ariane 6 rocket delivered - Ars Technica
articles.description: This was the first launch of the Ariane 64, the most powerful rocket in European space history.

articles.author: Stephen Clark
articles.title: ULA’s Vulcan rocket suffers another booster problem on the way to orbit - Ars Technica
articles.description: Vulcan's Blue Origin-made BE-4 engines appear to have saved the rocket from failure.
